articles.title: Kenya: Showmax Slashes Mobile Subscription in Kenya By 20% - AllAfrica.com
articles.description: As of 19 April, Showmax mobile subscribers in Kenya will pay Ksh 300 a month for access to the full Showmax catalogue on a single mobile device. This is a 20% reduction on the previous price point of Ksh 380.
